xml.metadata:
xnbData: target: "w" compressed: true hiDef: true readerData: - type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]" version: 0
- type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.StringReader" version: 0
numSharedResources: 0
content: #!Dictionary<String,String>
xml.p: Introduction: "Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm Alex.#$e#I'll see you around." #!String
Resort_Entering: "Finally, we're here!" #!String
Resort_Leaving: "Aw... I guess it can't last forever.$s" #!String
Resort_Wander: "I knew I shoulda brought a frisbee... Oh well.$h" #!String
Resort_Wander_2: "I wonder if anyone would be up for a volleyball tournament.#$e#Don't worry, I'll go easy!$h" #!String
Resort_Shore: "I wonder how far I could swim out, and still make it back?#$e#I'm guessing at least a mile.#$b#... Don't worry, I'm not going to try it.$h" #!String
Resort_Chair: "Aren't you hot in that outfit? C'mon, man... It's the beach!^Aren't you hot in that outfit? You gotta get some ocean breeze goin'!" #!String
Resort_Towel: "With this island open, there's no excuse to be pasty anymore!" #!String
Resort_Towel_2: "Phew, it feels good to finally get these abs a little sunlight.#$e#Kind of a shame to have them hidden away all the time back home." #!String
Resort_Towel_3: "When I go pro, I'll vacation on islands all around the world.#$e#But for now, this place will do just fine!$h" #!String
Resort_Bar: "I'm ordering a banana shake with two scoops of protein powder." #!String
Resort: "Ah... The island life. I could get used to this!" #!String
danceRejection: "Nah... I'm gonna ask someone else. Good luck." #!String
divorced: "I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.$s" #!String
dumped_Guys: "You're not worth my time.$a" #!String
secondChance_Guys: "I don't know if I can trust you anymore, but I'm willing to give you a chance.$9" #!String
breakUp: "You're giving me wha...?$7#$b#*huff*... Got it. Alright... well, you've made your choice. You're not gonna see me begging.$a" #!String
Mon: "Did you know I was an all-star quarterback in high school? It's true.$u#$e#See this little star on my jacket here? That proves it." #!String

Tue: "The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#*sigh*... I wish there were more girls in this town, know what I mean?$s^Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you have a bikini?" #!String

Wed: "Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.^If you weren't a girl I'd ask you to play catch.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?" #!String
Wed_01_old: "#$p 5#Go long! ...just kidding. Hahaha.|I just wish I had someone to play catch with...$s" #!String
Wed_01_01: "Really? I guess I underestimated you.#$b#My arm's a little sore, but maybe next time." #!String
Wed_01_02: "Yeah, some people just aren't made for sports." #!String
Wed_01_03: "Uh... nevermind." #!String
Thu: "The air's starting to warm up... I'm feeling pumped." #!String

Fri: "Hey, what's up farmer guy?^Hey, it's farm girl. Did you get new pants? You're doing something right.#e#Oh, I almost forgot! It's my day for doing push-ups!#e#Every time I do push-ups I try to do one more than last time. Pretty cool strategy, huh?" #!String
Sat: "My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a guy like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday." #!String
Sun: "Hey.#$e#What, you wanna talk to me? I'm busy." #!String
Sun2: "Hey, @.#$e#That's right, I remember your name." #!String
Sun4: "Hey, @.#$e#How's your day going?" #!String
Fri4: "Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#I'm not ashamed to say that I love my Grandma!#$e#Now Grandpa, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h" #!String
Tue6: "Nothing's better than an energetic day at the beach with your friends... right?" #!String

Mon8: "You know, I used to want fame and fortune, but lately I've been starting to sing a different tune. In the end it's the humble little things that satisfy, don't you think?#$e#I still want to go pro, but it's not the most important thing in the world." #!String
Fri8: "Hi @. You look sporty today.$h^Hey @. Did you do something different with your hair? Something keeps grabbing my attention.$h" #!String
Sat10: "I've been having a hard time staying focused lately.$l" #!String
Event_beach1: "Of course you do. If you didn't I'd think you were crazy. Or some kind of nerd." #!String
Event_beach2: "Really? You must be some kind of weirdo.$a#$b#Sorry." #!String
Event_books1: "No, I'm not! You're just trying to flatter me.$a" #!String
Event_books2: "Yeah, I guess you're right...$s" #!String
Event_books3: "You were supposed to disagree with me.$a" #!String
event_box1: "Yes... I know. That's why I've been so determined to be successful with my sports stuff...$9#$b#Make it or not... As long as I try my hardest I think she'd be proud. Thanks." #!String
event_box2: "Wow... It's the anniversary of my Mom's death! Have a heart...$a" #!String
event_box3: "...Thanks, @.#$b#You... you're different than the other guys. More sensitive.$l^You've become my best friend in the whole town... #$b#I'm glad.^Is that embarrassing to say?$l" #!String
event_box4: "That doesn't make me feel any better, jerk.$a" #!String
Event_parents1: "That's an interesting thought..." #!String
Event_parents2: "They would never do that!$a" #!String
Event_parents3: "...Maybe you're right... I dunno.$s" #!String
summer_1: "Hey. Summer is definitely the best time of year.#$e#Right now is great because we've got the whole season to look forward to. Catch you later." #!String

summer_Mon: "Hey, farmer guy. You look a little burnt.^Hey Farmer girl. You've got a nice tan going.$h#$e#The more I practice this summer, the easier it'll be for me to go pro.#$e#Then you'd be able to say you knew me once. Cool, huh?" #!String
summer_Tue: "If my hair wasn't so popular with the ladies, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough." #!String

summer_Wed: "Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a salesman" #!String

summer_Wed_01_old: "$p 52#Hey, when I turn pro you can say you were my first \"fan\". Not bad, huh?|Hey, I've been practicing twice as hard so I can turn pro and prove you wrong. You just wait.$a" #!String
summer_Wed_01_01: "Hey, now that's what I'm talking about!$h#$e#You're cooler than I thought." #!String
summer_Wed_01_02: "Yeah, well I'm so good I'm not going to have to practice all that much.$u" #!String

summer_Wed_01_03: "That's insane. You're just jealous that I'm talented and popular and you're not.$a^That's ridiculous. You're just jealous that I'm way more popular than you'll ever be, freak.$a#$e#Get away from me.$a" #!String

summer_Thu: "Hey, you must be getting pretty strong working on that farm all day.^Hey, you must be getting pretty fit working on that farm all day.#$e#Maybe you'll reach my level some day. Something to look forward to, huh?#$e#Why do you have that look on your face?" #!String
summer_Fri: "What do you want?#$e#I've got more important things to do right now." #!String
summer_Sat: "Mmmm... I smell a barbeque.#$e#Damn I could go for a burger." #!String

summer_Sun: "I got these new shoes yesterday 'cuz my old pair had a brown smudge.#$b#I just threw them into the garbage. I would've donated them but I don't like the idea of some weirdo wearing my shoes, ya know?#$e#...What?$a" #!String
summer_Sun4: "Oh wow...your shoes are a little dirty... but that's fine, too!#$e#Different people have different tastes I guess." #!String
summer_Thu4: "Hey, you look like you're getting into some good shape this summer!#$b#All that farm work is paying off, huh?" #!String
summer_Mon4: "Hey, nice tan." #!String
summer_Fri6: "Sorry my room is so messy.$s#$e#It's just hard to always remember to clean. I'm trying to get better, though." #!String
summer_Wed8: "You know, I actually wouldn't mind being a farmer... it seems a lot like playing sports, in a way.#$e#I like being outdoors and doing things with my hands." #!String
summer_Sat10: "I've been trying to do more reading lately... I feel like I've been neglecting my brain for years because of my athletic obsession." #!String
fall_1: "Sure, it's getting colder... But it's still warm enough for sports!#$e#That's all I care about." #!String
fall_Mon: "My Grandma told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#I was like, '...Grams, don't fret. I'm turning pro!'$h#$e#Studying is for nerds, anyway." #!String

fall_Wed: "Hey, I want to ask you something.^Hey, can I ask you something?#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#Do you think the ladies like my haircut?^What do you think about my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth." #!String
fall_Wed_01_old: "I put too much gel in my hair today. It kind of hurts.#$e#Don't touch it!#$e#...what?" #!String
fall_Wed_01_01: "Yeah, I know. That's why I have it like this." #!String
fall_Wed_01_02: "Yeah right. You're just jealous that I look so good." #!String
fall_Thu: "What's up?#$e#Isn't your name, like, %firstnameletter%name, or something?#$e#Oh. It's @? Okay. Sorry." #!String
fall_Fri: "I'm going to do two hundred sit-ups tonight.#$b#I'm pretty dedicated, aren't I?$h#$e#Need anything else?" #!String
fall_Sat: "I think you can find salmon in the river this time of year.#$e#At least that's what I heard." #!String
fall_Sun: "Hey, the gridball game is on today!#e#Sundays are pretty awesome in the fall.$u" #!String
fall_Thu2: "What's up, @?" #!String
fall_Fri6: "I'm going to do a ton of sit-ups tonight.#$e#You have to work really hard if you want to achieve your maximum potential." #!String
fall_Mon4: "My Grandma told me I should spend more time studying.#$e#Maybe she's right...$s" #!String
fall_Wed8: "I finally took the plunge... I've decided to stop putting gel in my hair.#$e#I wouldn't want to be friends with someone who only liked me because I have gel in my hair." #!String
fall_Thu10: "@! Um... Hi.$l" #!String
winter_1: "Winter is kind of lame. There's too much snow to do anything fun.#$e#I guess some people like it." #!String
winter_Mon: "You like the snow? Me... I'm just looking forward to spring." #!String
winter_Tue: "Hey, can you go find Haley and tell her I said 'hi'?" #!String
winter_Tue_inlaw_Haley: "Oh, hey. How's the married life coming along?$9" #!String
winter_Wed: "People stay indoors a lot during the winter, and do boring stuff.$s#$e#Maybe if I read a book I'd be less bored... nah." #!String
winter_Thu: "When I turn pro, I'll be so rich that I'll get a vacation home in the tropics.#$e#Then I won't have to deal with these boring winters." #!String
winter_Fri: "You came all the way through the snow to see me?#$e#I guess that makes sense." #!String
winter_Sat: "There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that guy Sebastian. Why does he wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it." #!String
winter_Sun: "Hey, the gridball game is on today!#e#This might be my favorite day of the week." #!String
winter_Fri4: "You came all the way through the snow to see me?#$e#That's nice of you.$h" #!String
winter_Sat6: "I guess it's interesting that some people are totally different than us, you know?#$b#I don't always understand why others act the way they do, but that's fine." #!String
winter_Tue4: "Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?$l#$b#If you see Haley, tell her I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks." #!String
winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley: "I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and Haley got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.$9" #!String
winter_Wed8: "You know what? I'm going to start reading a book!" #!String
winter_Thu6: "I wish I could control the weather." #!String
winter_Thu10: "If I ever make a lot of money, I'll make sure all my friends and family are taken care of.#$e#That means you, too.$h" #!String
